newsitem.title: USA: United Airlines cargo revenue rises.
newsitem.headline: United Airlines cargo revenue rises.

text.p: UAL Corp's United Airlines said its worldwide cargo division had a record $772.5 million in revenue in 1996, up 4.1 percent from the previous year.
Cargo revenue ton miles rose 5.7 percent, with freight ton miles up 5.8 percent and mail ton miles up 5.2 percent, United said.
UAL shares were up 1/2 at 56-1/8 Thursday.
